18using UnityEngine;
19
20namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
21{
25 public class Drill : MonoBehaviour
26 {
30 public GameObject indicator;
34 public GameObject prefab = null;
35
36 public Material material;
40 public SteamVR_Action_Boolean actionIndicate = SteamVR_Input.GetAction<SteamVR_Action_Boolean>("instrument", "Indicate");
44 public SteamVR_Action_Boolean actionInteract = SteamVR_Input.GetAction<SteamVR_Action_Boolean>("instrument", "Interact");
45
46 private Interactable interactable;
47
52 private void Start()
53 {
54 interactable = GetComponent<Interactable>();
55 }
56
61 void Update()
62 {
63 if (!interactable.attachedToHand) return;
64
65 SteamVR_Input_Sources hand = interactable.attachedToHand.handType;
66
67 if (actionInteract.GetStateDown(hand))
68 {
69 if (prefab == null) return;
70 CaseController controller = FindObjectOfType<CaseController>();
71 Transform targetParent = controller.loadedPatient.transform;
72
73 Transform attachmentPoint = transform.Find("AttachmentPoint");
74 GameObject hitPoint = Instantiate(prefab, attachmentPoint.transform.position, indicator.transform.rotation);
75
76 hitPoint.transform.parent = null;
77 hitPoint.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.15f, 0.15f, 0.15f);
78 hitPoint.GetComponent<Renderer>().material = material;
79
80 if (targetParent == null) return;
81
82 hitPoint.transform.parent = targetParent;
83 controller.GetComponent<CaseController>().AddStep(hitPoint);
84 }
85
86 if (actionIndicate.GetStateDown(hand))
87 {
88 indicator.SetActive(true);
89 }
90
91 if (actionIndicate.GetStateUp(hand))
92 {
93 indicator.SetActive(false);
94 }
95 }
96
102 public void LoadAttachment(GameObject attachment, float offset)
103 {
104 string attachmentName = attachment.name;
105 Transform attachmentPoint = transform.Find("AttachmentPoint");
106
107 if (prefab != null) Destroy(prefab);
108
109 attachmentPoint.localPosition = new Vector3(attachmentPoint.localPosition.x, attachmentPoint.localPosition.y, offset);
110
111 GameObject attached = Instantiate(attachment, attachmentPoint.transform.position, indicator.transform.rotation);
112
113 Destroy(attached.GetComponent<MeshCollider>());
114 Destroy(attached.GetComponent<Throwable>());
115 Destroy(attached.GetComponent<Rigidbody>());
116 Destroy(attached.GetComponent<Interactable>());
117 Destroy(attached.GetComponent<Attachment>());
118 attached.transform.parent = transform.Find("AttachmentPoint").transform;
119 attached.name = attachmentName;
120
121 prefab = attached;
122 }
123 }
124}
